comment.author: 42957903@N07
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Oregon State Downtowns (OSD), and we'd love to have this added to the group! It is amazing, these old photographs that depict such towns. Town history is really interesting to me, and this is neat to see. Thank you for uploading online. Also, trying to get a representation of as many Oregon towns as possible in this group, so would appreciate it if you added this, or any others you would want.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: Thanks OSD! Can you send us an invite to add the photo to your group?

comment.author: 42957903@N07
comment._content: You already sent the photo to our group.   Thank you.
